meaningMnemonic: When you <kanji>inquire</kanji> about a <kanji>problem</kanji>, you tend to do <vocabulary>interrogation</vocabulary>-style <vocabulary>questioning</vocabulary> to get to the bottom of it. Why is it like this? What happened? Is it bigger than a breadbox?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
